Mondays Aqua Fitness with Tina 8AM Open Pickleball Play 10AM Greetings from Splash – Card Making Craft 2PM Open Basketball Play 4PM Family Movie Night 6PM Tuesdays The Guess How Many Game Splash Bingo 12PM Splash AirShow 2PM Family Game Hour 4PM Wednesdays Open Pickleball Play 10AM GaGa Ball Tournament 12PM Button Bonanza Wednesdays! 2PM Open Basketball Play 4PM Thursdays Complimentary Coffee & Conversation 8AM Hula Hoop Party 12PM Sidewalk Chalk Art 4PM Football Watch Night 7PM Fridays First Friday Market and Blood Drive 9AM-12PM GaGa Ball Tournament 12PM Friendship Fridays - Bracelet Making 2PM Bubbles & Beats 4PM Karaoke 5PM Saturdays The Guess How Many Game Yoga 8AM Splash Rocks! 10AM Foam Party 12PM Cornhole Tournament 2PM Welcome Center Wine Hour 4PM Live Music 6PM Sundays Sunday Breakfast Buffet ($) 8AM-11AM Pickleball Instruction with Tammy 10AM Grandparents Day Craft 12PM Splash Scavenger Hunt 2PM Music Bingo 6PM About Us SPLASH is a short drive from Navarre and Pensacola beaches, giving you the chance to experience the perfect blend of secluded nature and fun in the sun. We are conveniently located just off I-10 in Milton, Florida. Contact 8500 Welcome Church Road, Milton, FL 32583 [email protected] (850) 600-8500 Links Rallies at Splash Splash!
